name: Chica's Acronical Excursion
description:
This is a modified version of the game that includes text sounds when the characters speak. I did not make the base game. This is also a reupload of the base game for archival purposes.

Chica's Acronical Excursion is a fan made sequel of Freddy's Acronical Excursion. In this game you travel throughout time and collect animatronics in order to stop Springtrap from destroying female  debauchery.

This specific version of the game has been modified to play sound when the characters speak. 

NOTE: the audio modification has some issues, mainly around Springtrap. I'm not fixing it so don't ask me to.

This game features:

 -  Engaging Cameras

- Cringe Dialogue

- Broken English

- Personas and Persona 4 references

- Original Characters

- Special Hate

and more...

You will need RPG Maker RTP to play this game.

(It's free)

word of advice... don't play this game just watch the let's play  it's much less of a headache.
